definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: I will send fire upon Teman that will consume the fortresses of Bozrah.
sentences.chinese: 我卻要降火在毯螅，燒滅波斯拉的宮殿。

sentences.english: But I will send a fire into the house of Hazael, which shall devour the palaces of Benhadad.
sentences.chinese: 我卻要降火在哈薛的家中，燒滅便哈達的宮殿。

sentences.english: The god who answers by fire-he is God.
sentences.chinese: 那降火顯應的神，就是神。

sentences.english: I will send fire upon the walls of Tyre that will consume her fortresses.
sentences.chinese: 我卻要降火在推羅的城內，燒滅其中的宮殿。

sentences.english: But I will send a fire upon Teman, which shall devour the palaces of Bozrah.
sentences.chinese: 我卻要降火在毯螅，燒滅波斯拉的宮殿。

sentences.english: And I will send a fire on judah burning up the great houses of jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 我卻要降火在猶大，燒滅耶路撒冷的宮殿。

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to get angry/to suffer from excessive internal heat (TCM)
to spend a summer holiday/(esp of Chinese medicine) to relieve summer heat
